com.netflix.spectator.api

Interface Meter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Counter, DistributionSummary, Gauge, LongTaskTimer, Timer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMeter, AbstractTimer, BucketCounter, BucketDistributionSummary, BucketTimer, PercentileDistributionSummary, PercentileTimer

    public interface Meter
    A device for collecting a set of measurements. Note, this interface is only intended to be implemented by registry implementations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasExpired()
      Indicates whether the meter is expired.
      Id id()
      Identifier used to lookup this meter in the registry.
      Iterable<Measurement> measure()
      Get the set of measurements for this meter.

    • Method Detail

      • id

        Id id()
        Identifier used to lookup this meter in the registry.

      • measure

        Iterable<Measurement> measure()
        Get the set of measurements for this meter.

      • hasExpired

        boolean hasExpired()
        Indicates whether the meter is expired. For example, a counter might expire if there is no activity within a given time frame.
